alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued April 01 at 3:18PM PDT until April 02 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT SUNDAY FOR PYRAMID LAKE... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 11 PM PDT SUNDAY... * CHANGES...None. * WHAT...For the Lake Wind Advisory, west winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. Waves 1 to 3 feet. For the Wind Advisory, west winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...For the Lake Wind Advisory, from 8 AM Saturday to 11 AM PDT Sunday. For the Wind Advisory, from 11 AM to 11 PM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow down tree limbs and a few power outages may result. Patchy blowing dust could reduce visibility at times to less than one mile. This may bring periods of reduced visibility to I-80, US-50, and US-95. Lake waters will be rough, and small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing.
info.instruction: Now is the time to secure loose outdoor items such as patio furniture, holiday decorations, and trash cans before winds increase which could blow these items away. The best thing to do is prepare ahead of time by making sure you have extra food and water on hand, flashlights with spare batteries and/or candles in the event of a power outage.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
